spEffectId.Wiki: The SpEffect this permanent buff grants.

iconId.Wiki: The icon used to represent this permanent buff

secondaryIconId.Wiki: The icon displayed to the left of the title on pickup.

displayNumericValue.Wiki: If enabled, the numeric value is displayed for this buff in the status menu.

displayPercentageSymbol.Wiki: If enabled, a percentage symbol is displayed by the numeric value for this buff in the status menu.

numericValue.Wiki: The numeric value to display in the status menu for this buff.

graceSpEffectId.Wiki: Used for the 'finding graces raises attack' power buff
